explains: v. （使）变暗，变黑；（使）变得阴郁；（脸色）变阴沉

sentences.en: The sky began to darken as the storm approached.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨来临时天空变得黑沉沉的。

sentences.en: Please trim my eyebrows and darken them.
sentences.cn: 请把眉毛修一下，再画深一点。

sentences.en: Please darken the blue paint with black paint.
sentences.cn: 请在蓝漆里掺上点黑漆。
